results.title: Safety with small craft
results.creator_credit: Southern Films and Eric L. Morris
results.brief_description: Outlines commonsense safety rules to be followed on rivers, lakes and the sea by water skiers, fishermen, skin-divers, and yachtsmen. Rules regarding life-jackets, giving way, speed limits, and fuelling procedures are illustrated. Suggests simple precautions to be taken by power boat owners to ensure safety.
results.description: Outlines commonsense safety rules to be followed on rivers, lakes and the sea by water skiers, fishermen, skin-divers, and yachtsmen. Rules regarding life-jackets, giving way, speed limits, and fuelling procedures are illustrated. Suggests simple precautions to be taken by power boat owners to ensure safety.

Rules regarding life-jackets, giving way, speed limits, and fuelling procedures are illustrated. Suggests simple precautions to be taken by power boat owners to ensure safety.

results.title: Safety oriented first aid. Unit 4
results.brief_description: One of a series of instructional first aid films. Details what to do in casualty management, including removal of hazards, assessment of situation, examining the casualty and administering first aid. Narrated by John Granik.

results.title: Safety oriented first aid. Unit 3
results.brief_description: One of a series of instructional first aid films. Head, neck and back injuries - their examination and treatment, and moving the victim if necessary. The causes of burns and scalds, and first aid procedures. First aid for eye injuries, handling and moving casualties, and first aid for victims of poisoning. Narrated by John Granik.

results.title: Safety oriented first aid. Unit 2
results.brief_description: One of a series of instructional first aid films. Explains the symptoms of shock, its causes and treatment. Shows fractures and dislocations; how they occur, and their treatment. Narrated by John Granik.

results.title: Safety oriented first aid. Unit 1
results.brief_description: One of a series of instructional first aid films. Concentrates on artificial respiration, with demonstrations of various methods, and illustrates causes of loss of breathing. Narrated by John Granik.

group_works.title: The Lost 600

results.title: Safety in the shop: power tools
results.brief_description: Stresses common sense practices in the use of woodworking and metal working machines, including the drill press, grinder, jointer, router and various types of power saws and lathes. Shows the need for proper clothing, machine guards, making adjustments before starting the machine, dealing with broken blades and the value of neatness.
results.description: Stresses common sense practices in the use of woodworking and metal working machines, including the drill press, grinder, jointer, router and various types of power saws and lathes. Shows the need for proper clothing, machine guards, making adjustments before starting the machine, dealing with broken blades and the value of neatness.

results.title: Safety in the shop: basic practices
results.brief_description: This film emphasises the worker’s responsibility for safety in both wood and metal shops in clothing, lifting and carrying. Important also are the values of tidiness and the taking of adequate precautions in fire prevention.
